events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The shipping status hasn't updated, and I'm really frustrated with the delay.
The customer's issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the complaint about late shipping and lack of tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specializing in shipping and delivery problems.
Hello! I understand your order has not arrived yet and I’m here to help resolve this delay as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide me with your order number and any tracking information you might have so I can investigate this for you?
My order number is 123456789. The tracking page has not updated in over a week, so I don’t have new information on the package’s location.
I have contacted the shipping carrier to expedite your package and I will update you as soon as I receive their response, aiming to resolve this as soon as possible.
Thank you for your prompt response and for looking into the issue. I appreciate your help and hope the package arrives soon.
The shipping carrier has confirmed your package is now out for delivery and should arrive within the next 24 hours. Please let us know if you have any further issues.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your order and that everything arrived as expected. We’re here if you need any more assistance.
Since your delivery issue appears resolved, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and please reach out anytime in the future.
